Original:
最近造訪了位於新北市林口區八德路350號1樓的 Black Sugar - Cocktail & Wine 🍸，非常印象深刻。我造訪的亮點是一款名為“泰久不見”的自創雞尾酒🌺。這款飲品帶有獨特的泰式奶茶風味，口味平衡得非常出色，既清新又難忘。

酒吧的氛圍🏠溫馨舒適，營造出精緻的休閒氣氛。特別值得一提的是調酒師，他們不僅擁有豐富的知識，還有高超的技術，為客人提供了極佳的服務體驗👍。

無論您是雞尾酒愛好者還是只是想找個愉快的地方放鬆，Black Sugar - Cocktail & Wine 都是必去之地🌟。這不僅僅是一個酒吧；它是一種滿足所有感官的體驗。極力推薦！👌
EN:
I recently visited the Black Sugar -Cocktail & Wine 🍸 on the first floor of Badou Road, Linkou District, New Taipei City, was very impressive.The highlight of my visit is a self -made cocktail called "Thailand Never Seeing".This drink has a unique Thai milk tea flavor, and the taste is very good, both fresh and unforgettable.

The atmosphere of the bar is warm and comfortable, creating a delicate leisure atmosphere.It is particularly worth mentioning that the bartender. They not only have rich knowledge, but also have superb technologies, providing guests with excellent service experience.

Whether you are a cocktail enthusiast or just want to find a pleasant place to relax, Black Sugar -Cocktail & Wine is a must -have place.This is not just a bar; it is an experience that satisfies all sensory.Recommended strongly!Bleak

Original:
我想說這是台灣台北最好的雞尾酒吧和酒廊。
我們走進酒吧，美麗的溫妮女士迎接了我們，她為我們展示了一張漂亮的桌子。她非常有禮貌地介紹菜單並推薦最暢銷的商品。偶爾，晚上他們的酒吧還會有一位美麗的冠軍調酒師從香港遠道而來台北……幸運的是我們能品嚐到香港冠軍調酒師的獲獎雞尾酒，“香港馬提尼”味道鮮美，口感複雜！酒吧小吃非常美味和台灣風格，因為他們使用了當地最好的新鮮食材。酒吧老闆托尼奧先生為我們拍攝了一些特別的鏡頭，讓我們度過了愉快的一天……我們在林口黑糖酒廊度過了一個美好的夜晚，我們絕對會再次回去拜訪他們！感謝黑糖工作人員的出色工作

I want to say that this is the best cocktail bar and lounge in Taipei, Taiwan.
We walked into the bar, and the beautiful Ms. Winnie greeted us, and she showed us a beautiful table.She is very polite to introduce menu and recommend the best -selling products.Occasionally, at night in their bar, there will be a beautiful champion bartender from Hong Kong to Taipei from Hong Kong ...
